Player History
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/11/1985 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1988, off Dennis Eckersley (OAK)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Detroit on 4/17/1988...
Hit first career homerun on 5/15/1988, off David Wells (TOR)...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,954,286 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Texas to San Diego on 2/17/1989 (Going to SD: P Greg A. Harris, LF Randy Ready. Going to TEX: 1B Kevin Maas)...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,857,143 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Atlanta on 6/29/1990...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,857,143 through salary arbitration...
5/11/1991: Signed a contract extension with San Diego, $3,150,000 per year, for 2 years.
